allOf.description: global rules can be defined with 'rules' and 'extend' properties

___repositories.description: A map of rules that apply to specific repositoriy (keys are names of repositories). Each name can be prefixed with '<org>/'

___organizations.description: A map of rules that apply to specific organization (keys are names of orgs)

___teams.description: A map of rules that apply to specific team (keys are names of teams. Each name can be prefixed with '<org>/'

___plugins.description: An optional array of plugin names
